comment.body: is it possible to have user input of some sort to further isolate or diminish porn?  ex: enough down votes or flags push the content further down the list?  of course i'm asking out of ignorance.

@Daniell Mesquita: in the spirit of the freedom of ZeroNet, I would not want to stop or censor people from seeding porn or anything they wish, it would just be nice to be able to sheild one's self from it if so desired.  I'm sure it's a tricky thing.
@Daniell Mesquita: Well, it was at one point.  Sorry for my interruption.
@Daniell Mesquita: ok, i must have missed the commnent.  sounds good.
